questions:
What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A building
B) A piece of clothing
C) A landscape
D) A person

What type of clothing is being displayed in the photo?
A) A formal suit
B) A casual dress
C) A knitted outfit
D) A sports uniform

What is the color scheme of the clothing?
A) Bright and vibrant colors
B) Dark and muted tones
C) Light and neutral tones
D) Metallic shades

What is in the background of the photo?
A) A busy street
B) A tent or booth
C) A mountain range
D) A beach scene

What is the clothing item displayed on?
A) A mannequin
B) A hanger
C) A person
D) A table

What element is prominently featured on the front of the clothing?
A) Zippers
B) Buttons
C) Pockets
D) Embroidery

What is the ground in the foreground of the photo covered with?
A) Sand
B) Grass
C) Concrete
D) Snow

What additional items can be seen in the background of the photo?
A) Other pieces of clothing
B) Food items
C) Electronic gadgets
D) Books

What is the lighting like in the photo?
A) Dim and dark
B) Bright and sunny
C) Artificial and harsh
D) Soft and diffused

What is the length of the clothing item in the photo?
A) Short
B) Knee-length
C) Ankle-length
D) Floor-length

What is the condition of the grass in the foreground?
A) Lush and green
B) Dry and brown
C) Covered in snow
D) Sandy and sparse

What type of sleeves does the clothing item have?
A) Short sleeves
B) Long sleeves
C) Sleeveless
D) Cap sleeves

What kind of surface is the tent or booth set up on?
A) Pavement
B) Wooden platform
C) Grass
D) Sand

What kind of design detail is visible on the clothing?
A) Stripes
B) Ruffles
C) Sequins
D) Plaid

What is the primary focus of the background?
A) Natural scenery
B) Architectural structures
C) Cloths and tent
D) People

What kind of neckline does the clothing item have?
A) V-neck
B) Crew neck
C) Hooded
D) Off-the-shoulder
